snippet: The Handspring Puppet Company, which created the title character in “War Horse,” has new creations in a darker play, “Crow,” in London.
abstract: Handspring Puppet Company, which created horse puppets for the play War Horse, has new creations in play Crow in London; project marks a return to the dark, intellectually rigorous work that exemplified their aesthetic before War Horse.
lead_paragraph: The Handspring Puppet Company, which created the title character in “War Horse,” has new creations in a darker play, “Crow,” in London.

headline.seo: ‘Crow’ Features Birds by Handspring Puppet Company
headline.main: Leaving Behind Cute Horses for Dark Birds
headline.print_headline: Leaving Behind Cute Horses for Dark Birds
